data.actual_result: You appear invisible to yourself, but others see you as online until you actually go offline while your status being set to invisible
data.short_description: Invisible User still shown as Online after coming back from being offline.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a desktop client with another account to detect status changes on your account (or just bug somebody to tell you what is your status) - Change your status to invisible - Close your Android client, restart your internet connection, force stop Discord or do anything to ensure your status is actually offline - Open your Android client - Set your status to online - Set your status to invisible
